item.title: Patch Notes | 1.19 Pre-Release 2
item.description: Patch Notes | 1.19 Pre-Release 2 1.19 Pre-Release 2 The second pre-release for 1.19 is now available and it comes with a bunch of bugfixes! Important to note is that a recent change made it possible for more types of mobs to spawn inside Nether Portals, which caused them to instantly change dimensions after spawning. We will not be making any further changes to this before the release of 1.

item.title: Reviews | 1.19 Pre-Release 2
